column1: Table ES-6:  U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions with Electricity-Related Emissions Distributed by Economic Sector (MMT CO2 Eq.)

column2: a The LULUCF Sector Net Total is the net sum of all LULUCF CH4 and N2O emissions to the atmosphere plus net carbon stock changes.

Notes: Emissions from electric power are allocated based on aggregate electricity use in each end-use sector. Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Parentheses indicate negative values or sequestration.
